TopicTitle: 0.22 The Kerbal could use a sampler

Articles.Content:
Now when we collect a sample from the surface, the Kerbal does nothing.

The Kerbal could show a kind of scoop, putting it on the floor and draw a sample.

Thanx!! KSP 0.22 it's great!!!!!

I believe I saw an animation a while back of a Kerbal picking up a rock. i think that's what you're talking bout.

I guess they just haven't gotten round to adding it, that's kinda what happened with the Hitchhiker IVA
Some animations for EVAing kerbals would be awesome yes
As someone said earlier, I think we realy need the animation of a kerbal striking a golfball (maybe even for some scientific value?).
I think it would be funny if they gave him a pooper scooper... FOR SCIENCE!

I believe I saw an animation a while back of a Kerbal picking up a rock. i think that's what you're talking bout.

I guess they just haven't gotten round to adding it, that's kinda what happened with the Hitchhiker IVA

I assume you mean these?

(Apparently these were from a KSP Weekly that didn't survive the April forums derp - I managed to retrieve them via Google Images)
Cool, maybe the dev are not ready to release it, maybe we can see it in the next (or next of next) update

I assume you mean these?

(...)

(Apparently these were from a KSP Weekly that didn't survive the April forums derp - I managed to retrieve them via Google Images)

Yeah! that's what I proposed. Well, I guess it integrated into an update.
The animations are almost certainly on the way, I think. It'll be awesome to see what they're like when they're done
